page.title: 11CUSTOMS AT THE MAYPOLE
page.content: We have one main custom in our area. That is the Maypole May Festival.It is a large fete and it was all started by a man called Mr.Penn of the Maypole Community Centre ten years ago.At the fete there are people who take part in activities from local schools and chu- rches.The Maypole Centre Brownies and others have floats and they have a com- petition to see who's the best.We have the Maypole Centre dancers showing peo- ple dances.They have BMX shows,dogs shows,old tyme music hall and a May Princess.They have breakdancing compe- titions and 5 a side football.They have hook a duck,they have one which you have to throw a dart at a card and if you get three darts in you win a gold- fish,there are sweet stalls,drink stal- ls and competitions for mums and dads and kids.By Tanya Hopkins Sir Theodore Pritchett J/I School.
